message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.MA. 

The paper proposes a new variant of multi-armed bandits, which is a popular topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The focus of the paper is on considering the cost of pulling arms, which is related to optimization and decision-making (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the offline and online settings, which are common in game theory (cs.GT) and multi-agent systems (cs.MA).
